name: Gangsta Auto Thief IV: 3D Heist Escape Hustle in West-Coast City
name_original: Gangsta Auto Thief IV: 3D Heist Escape Hustle in West-Coast City
description:
In the fourth installment of Gangsta Auto Thief, the Main Homie In Charge takes his crime life to a new dimension in Gangsta Auto Thief IV's 3D universe.

Desperate for cash after his empire in San Gangster City has fallen, he has planned for a bank heist. Now it is up to the player to help the Main Homie In Charge get away from the cops on his bike.

Pedal to the metal in this adrenaline pumping 3D racing game.


Surely a favorite for fans of the Gangsta Auto Thief series and action/racing games alike! Download today and check it out.
